text: Ana hutetma amanage huta Rana tamagri Anumzamofona asamigahaze, Ra Anumzamoka keka'a naganera okani'na, Kagrama hu'nana kante ante'na ruotge'ma hu'nea ne'zana noniafintira hago eri'na Livae naga'ene, ruregati'ma enemaniza naga'ene, megusa mofavreramine, kento a'nenena ne'zana zamivagare'noe hutma hugahaze.
